menu.wiki.entries.help.title: Help
menu.wiki.entries.help.text: Learn how to use the wiki.
menu.wiki.entries.roles_and_teams.title: Roles and Teams
menu.wiki.entries.roles_and_teams.text:
Every player has a role, including you. Your role is told to you in the first chat message you received and at the top of the screen. Almost every role has an ability that can be used during the night, these abilities help you to win.

Every role has a ‚ÄúFaction‚Äù and ‚ÄúAlignment‚Äù which indicate what team you're on and what your goal is. You can see a role's faction and alignment on its wiki page. Town, and Mafia's goal is to be the only remaining team, and to kill every player from every other team. Neutral roles have different goals that vary depending on the role.

Town usually has the majority when the game starts meaning there are more players with town roles. Therefore; town has voting power, and evil players must lie, saying that they are townies even though they are not.

If you are asked to claim a role (to tell others what your role is), It is often best to say that you are a specific town role, such as doctor, or sheriff. In order to make your fake claim believable you must keep a will. 

There can be multiple players with almost any role, so you might not be the only person with the role you have.
menu.wiki.entries.phases_and_timeline.te:
The game is always in a phase. Phases run in this order: Morning, Discussion, Voting, Testimony, Judgement, Evening, Night. When there are three or less players alive, the game runs at double the speed.

### Night
When most roles use their abilities. For example, night is when the mafioso chooses who to kill, and the doctor chooses who to protect. Chat is closed at night so players can not communicate with each other. However, some roles can communicate with others at night, for example, the medium can talk to the dead, and mafia can talk with each other.

### Morning
Players see who died last night, and they are added to the graveyard.

### Discussion
Players discuss information they have to try to find out who evils are, or pretend to find out who evils are.

### Voting
Players vote to put a player on trial, this doesn‚Äôt always mean that player is going to be killed. More than half the living players need to vote in order to put someone onto trial. If the voting phase ends before anyone is voted, it goes directly to night after. There can be a maximum of three trials during each day.

### Testimony
This runs right after voting only if a player was voted onto trial, Every player must stop chatting except the player on trial, and the player defends themselves to hope they don't get killed. Usually the player on trial will claim a role and post their will here.

### Judgement
Everyone votes either innocent, or guilty. If there are more guilty votes than innocent votes, the player on trial is killed. Players can also choose to abstain. This is how town usually gets evils killed.

### Evening
A brief period after judgement but before night.
menu.wiki.entries.controls.title: Controls
menu.wiki.entries.controls.text: You can whisper and target people.
menu.wiki.entries.wills_and_notes.title: Wills and Notes
menu.wiki.entries.wills_and_notes.text:
## Wills

With any role, it is important to keep a final will. This is a document that shows all the information you claim to have and how you got it. Usually, all players are going to claim that they are a town role, so almost every will you see is a will of a town role.

Each night, the sheriff will choose a player and find out if they are innocent or suspicious. (See the wiki page for ‚Äúsheriff‚Äù to learn more).
Here is a typical sheriff will:

> N1: John-Innocent
N2: Peter-Innocent
N3: Jennifer-Suspicious

This will shows that on night 1, this sheriff found that John was innocent. On night 2, they found Peter innocent. On night 3, they found that Jennifer was suspicious.

The sheriff can post this will in order to claim, and show that Jennifer is likely evil. As an evil player, keeping a fake will is extremely important because a claim is only believable with a will alongside it.

## Notes

Notes are just for you, nobody else can see them. To keep organized, It is often very helpful to write down what role everyone else claimed. For example, a note page might look like this:

> John - Claims doctor
Peter - Claims sheriff
Jennifer - Never claimed, probably evil
menu.wiki.entries.visit.title: Visits
menu.wiki.entries.visit.text: Visits are how all roles work.
menu.playerList.title: Player List
menu.graveyard.title: Graveyard
role.jailor.name: Jailor
role.jailor.abilities:
* Choose one player to jail during the day
* You can execute your prisoners up to three times
role.jailor.attributes:
* You may anonymously talk with your prisoner at night
* If you execute a town member, you forfeit the ability to jail prisoners
* Jailed players are immune to all attacks, frames, transports, douses and more
* Jailed players can't use their ability
* Other players will know if their target was jailed
role.jailor.roleDataText.nobody:
You didn't decide to jail anybody.
\0 executions remaining
role.jailor.roleDataText:
You decided to jail \0.
\1 executions remaining
role.mayor.name: Mayor
role.mayor.abilities: * Reveal during the day to expose your role to everyone and gain 2 more votes
role.mayor.attributes:
* Your voting power is increased in both voting phase and judgement phase
* Revealing does not increase the number of votes required to put someone on trial
role.transporter.name: Transporter
role.transporter.abilities: * Transport two players with each other.
role.transporter.attributes:
* Transporting a target swaps all visitors to them; for example, all visitors that visit target A will instead visit target B, and vice versa
* You can transport yourself
role.sheriff.name: Sheriff
role.sheriff.abilities: * Interrogate a player to find out if they're innocent or suspicious
role.sheriff.attributes: * Frames, Douses, Hexes, and Enchants can make your target look suspicious wrongly
role.lookout.name: Lookout
role.lookout.abilities: * Watch a player to find everyone who visited them
role.lookout.attributes:
* You can not see astral visits
* You can never see yourself visit
role.spy.name: Spy
role.spy.abilities:
* Bug a player to find out what happened to them
* You will get to know who the mafia visited
role.spy.attributes:
* Your bug will catch when your target sees a message saying they are silenced, roleblocked, protected or transported
* The mafia visits can not be fooled, they are always accurate.
role.tracker.name: Tracker
role.tracker.abilities: * Watch a player to find who they visited
role.tracker.attributes: * You can not see astral visits
role.seer.name: Seer
role.seer.abilities: * Examine two players to find if they are friends or enemies
role.seer.attributes:
* Two players are friends if they could possibly both win together
* A jester can win alongside anyone, therefore the jester has no enemies
* Frames, Douses, Hexes, and Enchants can make your target look like they are a different role
role.doctor.name: Doctor
role.doctor.abilities:
* Heal a player to save them from death
* You can heal yourself once
role.doctor.attributes:
* You give your target powerful defense
* You and your target will know if they were attacked and saved
role.bodyguard.name: Bodyguard
role.bodyguard.abilities:
* Protect a to kill their attacker, but getting attacked yourself
* You can protect yourself once
role.bodyguard.attributes:
* When you guard yourself, you gain powerful defense
* You and your target will know if they were attacked and protected
* You will redirect attacks from your target onto yourself, and you will attack those players back
* Your attack is basic and astral
role.crusader.name: Crusader
role.crusader.abilities: * Protect a player to save them from death, but killing one other visitor to them
role.crusader.attributes:
* You give your target powerful defense
* You will attack A random other player who visited your target
* If both town members and non town members visit your target then you will kill a non townie
* Your attack is basic and astral
role.escort.name: Escort
role.escort.abilities: * Target a player to roleblock them
role.escort.attributes: * Roleblocking a player prevents them from using parts of their ability
role.medium.name: Medium
role.medium.abilities:
* You can talk with the dead during the night
* After you died, you can seance a living player twice
role.medium.attributes:
* You can talk to other mediums during the night as well
* A seance lets you communicate with the living after you died
* Seance has two uses
role.medium.roleDataText.nobody:
You didn't decide to seance anybody.
\0 seances remaining
role.medium.roleDataText:
You decided to seance \0.
\0 seances remaining
role.retributionist.name: Retributionist
role.retributionist.abilities: * Force a dead player to use their ability on a living one
role.retributionist.attributes:
* Your ability only works only on townies
* You cant use the same person two times
role.vigilante.name: Vigilante
role.vigilante.attributes:
* You have three bullets
* You can't shoot night 1
* If you shoot a town member, you will commit suicide the next night
* Your suicide deals an unstoppable attack towards yourself
* You have a basic attack
role.vigilante.roleDataText.suicide: You killed a townie and will commit suicide tonight
role.veteran.name: Veteran
role.veteran.abilities: * Target yourself to alert, killing everyone who visits you
role.veteran.attributes:
* You will know if you attack someone
* You have basic defense while on alert
* You have a powerful attack
* You have three alerts
role.deputy.name: Deputy
role.deputy.abilities: * Shoot one player during the day
role.deputy.attributes:
* When you kill a player, it will be announced that they were shot by a deputy
* If the player you attack survives the attack, they will know they were attacked, but it will not be announced that they were shot by a deputy
* You have a powerful attack
* You have one bullet
role.mafioso.name: Mafioso
role.mafioso.abilities: * Target a player to kill them
role.mafioso.attributes:
* A Godfather can force you to target someone else
* You have a basic attack
* If the mafia has no Mafioso, a member of the mafia will become the Mafioso at the start of night
role.consort.name: Consort
role.consort.abilities: * Target a player to roleblock them
role.consort.attributes: * Roleblocking a player prevents them from using parts of their ability
role.blackmailer.name: Blackmailer
role.blackmailer.abilities: * Blackmail a player to silence them for the next day
role.blackmailer.attributes: * Silenced players can not talk or vote
role.consigliere.name: Consigliere
role.consigliere.abilities: * Investigate a player to find out their role, find who they visited, and who visited them
role.consigliere.attributes:
* Your information can be fooled by other roles like framers, arsonists, and hex masters
* You can read whispers that were not sent to you
* You can never see yourself visit
role.necromancer.name: Necromancer
role.necromancer.abilities: * Force a dead player to use their ability on a living one
role.necromancer.attributes:
* You cant use the same person two times
* You can use the dead player to target two living ones, this is useful for roles like framer, transporter, and seer
role.witch.name: Witch
role.witch.abilities: * Force a player to use their ability on another one
role.witch.attributes: * You can use the player to target two living ones, this is useful for roles like framer, transporter, and seer
role.janitor.name: Janitor
role.janitor.abilities: * Clean a player on the night they die
role.janitor.attributes:
* Cleaning a player erases the role and will from their grave
* You will know the role and will of a player you clean
role.framer.name: Framer
role.framer.abilities: * Target two players to frame the first one
role.framer.attributes:
* The framed player will look like the mafioso to town investigative roles
* It will look like first target visited your second target, non attacking
* You can only choose non mafia members for your first target, but anyone as your second target
* Your second visit is astral
role.jester.name: Jester
role.jester.abilities:
* Get lynched to win
* After you are lynched, you can haunt a player who didn't vote innocent
role.jester.attributes:
* If you haunt nobody, you will haunt a random player
* Haunting is an unstoppable astral attack
role.executioner.name: Executioner
role.executioner.abilities:
* Get your target lynched to win
* If your target dies by something other than lynching, you will be converted to a jester
role.executioner.attributes:
* After you win you will commit suicide
* Your target will always be a townie, but never town power, or town killing
role.doomsayer.name: Doomsayer
role.doomsayer.abilities: ‚óè Guess the role of three living players in one night, killing them and winning the game
role.doomsayer.attributes:
‚óè When you win, you will commit suicide using an unstoppable attack
‚óèYou have to guess the exact role of townies, but just the faction of all other roles
‚óè You can not try to guess town investigative roles
‚óè If there is not enough players left for you to guess and win the game, you will convert to a jester
‚óè You do not visit, so the transporter doesn't effect your attack
‚óè Your attack is unstoppable
role.vampire.name: Vampire
role.vampire.abilities: * Bite a player to convert them to a vampire
role.vampire.attributes:
* Only the newest vampire can choose to bite
* Vampires can not bite on the night immediately following a night that they successfully converted another vampire
* You can not convert a player with defense
* If there are four or more vampires, they can not choose to bite someone
grave.deathNote: A note was left with the body:
judgement.cannotVote.dead: You can't vote because you're dead
chatMessage.playerDied:
\0 (\1) died and was killed by \2.
Their will stated:
chatMessage.deathNote: A note left with the body reads:
chatMessage.trialInformation: \0 votes needed for the \1 trials left today.
chatMessage.trialVerdict: \0 was voted \1 with \2 innocent votes and \3 guilty votes.
chatMessage.mayorCantWhisper: You can't whisper as or to a revealed mayor.
chatMessage.jailorDecideNotExecute: The Jailor decided not to execute.
chatMessage.mediumSeance: \0 is being seanced by a medium!
chatMessage.jesterWon: The jester will get their revenge from the grave!
chatMessage.executionerWon: The executioner got their target lynched and won!
chatMessage.jailorDecideExecute.nobody: The jailor decided not to execute!
chatMessage.youSurvivedAttack: You were attacked but had defense and survived.
chatMessage.targetSurvivedAttack: Your target had defense and survived the attack.
chatMessage.targetJailed: Your ability failed because one of your targets was in jail!
chatMessage.roleBlocked.immune: Someone tried to roleblock you but you are immune.
chatMessage.sheriffResult.suspicious: Your target seems to be suspicious.
chatMessage.sheriffResult.innocent: Your target seems to be innocent.
chatMessage.trackerResult.nobody: Your target did not visit anybody
chatMessage.spyBug.roleblocked: Someone attempted to roleblock your target.
chatMessage.spyBug.protected: Your target was protected from an attack.
chatMessage.retributionistMessage: Your target got the following message:
chatMessage.necromancerMessage: Your target got the following message:
chatMessage.witchMessage: Your target got the following message:
chatMessage.witchedYou: You were possessed by a witch.
chatMessage.witchedYou.immune: A witch tried to possess you but you were immune.
chatMessage.witchTargetImmune: Your target was immune to possession.
chatMessage.veteranAttackedYou: You were attacked by the veteran you visited.
chatMessage.vigilanteSuicide: You committed suicide over the guilt of killing an innocent person.
chatMessage.doctorHealed: You healed your target while they got attacked.
chatMessage.protectedYou: You were attacked but someone protected you.
chatMessage.silenced: You were silenced! You must not speak, chat, point, or otherwise communicate until tomorrow!
chatMessage.playersRoleAndWill: Your targets role was \0 and their will stated this: \1
They were not visited by anybody
chatMessage.doomsayerFailed: At least one of your guesses was incorrect or invalid.
chatMessage.doomsayerWon: Your guesses were correct, and you won!
